scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others "npm run watch:js" "npm run watch:css" "npm run watch:demo"
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:demo
scripts.build:js: rollup    -c -n clocklet -i src/script/index.ts -o dist/clocklet.js && uglifyjs -m -c join_vars=true -o dist/clocklet.min.js dist/clocklet.js
scripts.build:css: stylus    -o dist/clocklet.css src/style/style.styl && cleancss -o dist/clocklet.min.css dist/clocklet.css
